europeana:record.dc:title: Phyton, Annales Rei Botanicae, Horn 28_1 (1988)

Karbir Singh Khatri: Studies in the Caucasian Species of Cardamine (Cruciferae). 55- 80. Dimitrios T. Karl Stich, Robert Ebermann: Localization on Peroxidase Isoenzymes in Different Parts of Some Trees. 109- 114. Herwig Teppner: Onosma kaheiri spec. nova. und O. erectum (Boraginaceae) aus Griechenland. 115- 131. Elsa Kusel: Recensio. 132.
